text: Ara yakhana tini madayanera jalasayera kache elena takhana tini tate dekhalena ekadala loka pani kha'oyacche, ara tadera pase tini dekhate pelena dujana mahila agale rekheche. Tini balalena -- ''tomadera dujanera ki byapara?’’ Tara balale -- ''amara pani kha'oyate parachi na ye paryanta na rakhalara sariye niye yaya, ara amadera abba khuba buro manusa.’’
